string-array.name: inspirational_quotes_default
string-array.item: Every day is a new day.
Well done is better than well said.
One today is worth two tomorrows.
Be as you wish to seem.
The world is always in movement.
To get, you must first give.
Skill to do comes of doing.
A beautiful thing is never perfect.
We do what we do because we believe.
What we think, we will become.
If you can dream it, you can do it.
No garden is without it\'s weeds.
